title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Aug 31 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Aug 31 2021
description:
Biden breaks promise to evacuate every American. Last U.S. troops leave Afghanistan. Will Biden and Democrats pay a price at the polls for the Afghanistan disaster? Clay says because of clips aired of broken promises and how opponents will use in commercials, Biden is no longer a viable 2024 candidate. How will the administration distract from their failure? Biden will do thermonuclear gaslighting, Buck says. Fauciites target Florida Governor DeSantis' Parents' Bill of Rights. Outrage builds over dogs left behind in Afghanistan. Buck expresses his huge love of dogs and describes the sophisticated breeds that probably have been left behind.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
